languages.text: "Утрата наставника — прискорбное событие. Возглашаю мантру утешения духовного страдания". {n}В воксе Паскаля возникает странная вибрация, мягкая и увещевающая, совсем не похожая на обычный его сухой тон.{/n}

"Losing a mentor is a sorrowful event. Beginning the mantra of spiritual assuagement." {n}The sound of Pasqal's vox takes on a strange vibration, gentle and soothing, nothing like his usual dry tone.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Утрата наставника — прискорбное событие. Возглашаю мантру утешения духовного страдания". {n}В воксе Паскаля возникает странная вибрация, мягкая и увещевающая, совсем не похожая на обычный его сухой тон.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Losing a mentor is a mournful event. Beginning the mantra of spiritual assuagement." {n}The sound of Pasqal's vox takes on a strange vibration, gentle and soothing, nothing like his usual dry tone.{/n}

languages.text: "Einen Mentor zu verlieren, ist ein Ereignis, das Trauer auslöst. Beginne mit dem Mantra spiritueller Linderung." {n}Der Klang von Pasqals Vox nimmt eine merkwürdige Vibration an, sanft und beruhigend, ganz anders als sein üblicher, teilnahmsloser Ton.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Losing a mentor is a sorrowful event. Beginning the mantra of spiritual assuagement." {n}The sound of Pasqal's vox takes on a strange vibration, gentle and soothing, nothing like his usual dry tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Einen Mentor zu verlieren, ist ein Ereignis, das Trauer auslöst. Beginne mit dem Mantra spiritueller Linderung." {n}Der Klang von Pasqals Vox nimmt eine merkwürdige Vibration an, sanft und beruhigend, ganz anders als sein üblicher, teilnahmsloser Ton.{/n}

languages.text: « La perte d'un mentor est un événement tragique. Récitation du mantra d'apaisement spirituel. » {n}Le son du vox de Pasqal se met à vibrer de façon étrange, à la fois douce et réconfortante, à mille lieues de son ton sec habituel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Losing a mentor is a sorrowful event. Beginning the mantra of spiritual assuagement." {n}The sound of Pasqal's vox takes on a strange vibration, gentle and soothing, nothing like his usual dry tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La perte d'un mentor est un événement tragique. Récitation du mantra d'apaisement spirituel. » {n}Le son du vox de Pasqal se met à vibrer de façon étrange, à la fois douce et réconfortante, à mille lieues de son ton sec habituel.{/n}

languages.text: “失去导师是件令人悲伤的事情，开始颂唱精神抚慰祷文。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵装置中传来了古怪的振动，温柔而舒缓，完全不像他平时干巴巴的语调。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Losing a mentor is a sorrowful event. Beginning the mantra of spiritual assuagement." {n}The sound of Pasqal's vox takes on a strange vibration, gentle and soothing, nothing like his usual dry tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “失去导师是件令人悲伤的事情，开始颂唱精神抚慰祷文。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵装置中传来了古怪的振动，温柔而舒缓，完全不像他平时干巴巴的语调。{/n}

languages.text: 「師を失うのは悲しいことだ。霊を慰めるマントラを開始する」{n}パスカルのヴォクスの音が、いつもの冷淡な調子とはうって変わり、優しく慰めるような、奇妙な振動を発する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Losing a mentor is a sorrowful event. Beginning the mantra of spiritual assuagement." {n}The sound of Pasqal's vox takes on a strange vibration, gentle and soothing, nothing like his usual dry tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「師を失うのは悲しいことだ。霊を慰める真言を開始しよう」{n}パスカルのヴォクスの音が、いつもの冷淡な調子とはうって変わり、優しく慰めるような、奇妙な振動を発する。{/n}
「師を失うのは悲しいことだ。霊を慰めるマントラを開始する」{n}パスカルのヴォクスの音が、いつもの冷淡な調子とはうって変わり、優しく慰めるような、奇妙な振動を発する。{/n}

languages.text: «Perder un mentor es un momento trágico. Inicio el mantra de confortación espiritual». {n}El voco de Pasqal vibra de una forma inusual, leve y reconfortante, muy diferente a su habitual tono seco.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Losing a mentor is a sorrowful event. Beginning the mantra of spiritual assuagement." {n}The sound of Pasqal's vox takes on a strange vibration, gentle and soothing, nothing like his usual dry tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Perder un mentor es un momento triste. Inicio el mantra de confortación espiritual». {n}El voco de Pasqal vibra de una forma inusual, leve y reconfortante, muy diferente a su habitual tono seco.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Losing a mentor is a mournful event. Beginning the mantra of spiritual assuagement." {n}The sound of Pasqal's vox takes on a strange vibration, gentle and soothing, nothing like his usual dry tone.{/n}

languages.text: "Yönder kaybetmek, üzücü bir hadisedir. Ruhani yatıştırma düsturu başlatılıyor." {n}Pasqal'ın voksunun sesine normaldeki yavan tonunun zıddı, nazik ve teskin edici, tuhaf bir titreşim hâkim oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Losing a mentor is a sorrowful event. Beginning the mantra of spiritual assuagement." {n}The sound of Pasqal's vox takes on a strange vibration, gentle and soothing, nothing like his usual dry tone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mentor kaybetmek, üzücü bir hadisedir. Ruhani yatıştırma düsturu başlatılıyor." {n}Pasqal'ın voksunun sesine normaldeki yavan tonunun zıddı, nazik ve teskin edici, tuhaf bir titreşim hâkim oluyor.{/n}
